import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const DetailView = (id) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('product-1'); const [watch, setWatch] = useState(null); const handleTabChange = (tabId) => { setActiveTab(tabId); }; useEffect(() => { const id = id.match.watch.id; console.log(id); axios.get(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/dashboard/watches/${id}/`) .then(response => { setWatch(response.data); }) .catch(error => { console.log(error); }); }, [id.match.watch.id]); return (
